# Question 1

The gradient to $g$ is $\nabla g(x,y) = (-2x - 2y^2x-2y+2, -2x^2y-2x)$.

The Hessian matrix is

$$H_g = \begin{bmatrix}
-2-2y^2 & -4xy-2\\
-4xy & -2x^2
\end{bmatrix}$$
